text: Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ manɨgali agadɨ sabaŋ osɨ vadɨm magɨla magɨla hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨdaŋ sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ hulemɨlɨ sabaŋ osɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ iahua mɨgahɨnihɨni sagaŋ lɨbavɨhadami agɨladɨdaŋ mɨŋamɨguci haba hɨma fɨhalavɨmi. Sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ hulemɨlɨ limu hɨhɨle Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ sɨvɨ uavɨmi agɨladɨ avi mɨŋamɨguci haba hɨma fɨhalavɨmi. Nulɨdɨ hulaŋ mu cɨki avi hɨhi ma hɨniavɨmi.
